author: Angela Iskander-Torres
title: ADLINK Technology Showcasing Application-ready Infotainment Platforms At G2E Global Gaming Exhibition 2015
text:
ADLINK Technology, a leading global provider of cloud-based services, intelligent gateways and embedded building blocks for edge devices that enable the Internet of Things (IoT), invites attendees to view and experience our new line of gaming and vending solutions first-hand, Booth 3913, at next week’s G2E 2015 event, September 29th – October 1st at Sands Expo and Convention Center in Las Vegas, Nevada. “We are excited to show our new line of application ready infotainment solutions. With our unique hardware and software integration it is now much easier to handle the complexity of the peripherals. Our customers will be able to focus more on their core application.” said Wendelin Eisenring, Business Development Director Infotainment of ADLINK.
ADLINK demonstration highlights include:
 Full of scalable and high performance embedded PC with I/O for gaming & entertainment Intelligent middleware for peripheral integration and communication Mini-ITX boards with gaming and entertainment-specific features Computer-on-modules (COMs) and carrier boards for gaming and entertainment Embedded security features for gaming devices
For more information on ADLINK’s Application-ready platforms for infotainment solutions, please visit: http://www.adlinktech.com
For more information on G2E or to register for an expo pass, please visit: http://www.globalgamingexpo.com/Register-Now/
About ADLINK
ADLINK Technology is enabling the Internet of Things (IoT) with innovative embedded computing solutions for edge devices, intelligent gateways and cloud services. ADLINK’s products are application-ready for industrial automation, communications, medical, defense, transportation, and infotainment industries. Our product range includes motherboards, blades, chassis, modules, and systems based on industry standard form factors, as well as an extensive line of test & measurement products and smart touch computers, displays and handhelds that support the global transition to always connected systems. Many products are Extreme Rugged™, supporting extended temperature ranges, shock and vibration.
ADLINK is a Premier Member of the Intel® Internet of Things Solutions Alliance and is active in several standards organizations, including PCI Industrial Computer Manufacturers Group (PICMG), PXI Systems Alliance (PXISA), and Standardization Group for Embedded Technologies (SGeT).
ADLINK is a global company with headquarters in Taiwan and manufacturing in Taiwan and China; R&D and integration in Taiwan, China, the US, and Germany; and an extensive network of worldwide sales and support offices. ADLINK is ISO-9001, ISO-14001, ISO-13485 and TL9000 certified and is publicly traded on the TAIEX Taiwan Stock Exchange (stock code: 6166).
